entry.title: Java developer
entry.text:
#вакансия #java #developer #middle #senior #relocate

Java Developer
Компания: Interactive Brokers
Локация: Таллин
Занятость: fulltime
З/п: 3.5-5К € 
Контакты: @observer69

Product: is a low cost provider of trade execution and clearing services for individuals,
advisors, proprietary trading groups, brokers and hedge funds. IBKR’s premier technology
provides electronic access to stocks, options, futures, forex, bonds and funds on over 100
markets worldwide from a single IBKR Universal account. Interactive Brokers Group’s
(IBG) headquarters are in Greenwich, CT. IBG has offices throughout the United States,
Switzerland, Canada, Hong Kong, the United Kingdom, Australia, Hungary, Russia, India,
China and Estonia.

Условия
● Salary level: from 3500 to 5000 euros gross, but no strict limits, have never rejected a
candidate due to their salary request
● Benefits:
- discretionary salary raise in the end of each calendar year
- discretionary cash and stock bonus in the end of each calendar year
- lunch paid by the company (up to 7.50 EUR/day)
- dental/vision expenses compensation of 205 EUR per year
- sport activities compensation of 45 EUR/month
- 2,000 EUR and 2 days off per year for conferences, online courses, seminars, etc.
● Relocation:
- No relocation experience
- Relocation package: willing to discuss, don’t have experience, cover the visa
● Office:
- Location: near the city center / 3-5 minutes by foot/bus/train, free parking
- No open spaces; Rooms for ~ 2-3 persons (everyone can concentrate)
- Remote work is not allowed due to the security reasons, but very flexible working hours

Требования
● 3+ years of software development experience with an emphasis on Java
● Fluency in Core Java
● Proactive, driven to excel and get things done on time
● Ability to work and deliver independently with little supervision
● BS in Computer Science, or equivalent (advanced degrees a plus)
● Passion for building top-quality user-interface products
● Strong communication skills (good written/spoken English skills is a must, at least intermediate)
● Understanding spoken Russian
● Job-hoppers are 100% no-go (at least 2 years at each company, the more the better. At least 1,5  years at the latest one).

Желательно
● Experience with Java GUI toolkits (Swing, AWT or similar); this could be
substituted with strong desire to learn Swing/AWT and related technology
● Familiarity with market data concepts and trading technologies and technical
experience with systems used in the capital & financial markets all are a
big plus
● Experience with Java development for mobile platforms

Задачи
1. UI components design and implementation in Java 
2. Development testing
3. Engineering documentation
4. Focus on: existing product development (20% bug fixing/80%new features)
